cards.title: Carnaval
powers: Reveal cards from the top of your deck until 2 Masques are revealed. Put 1 into your hand or into play. Shuffle the remaining cards back into your deck.
incapacitatedAbilities: Reveal the top card of a deck. Replace or discard it.
Select a target. The next time that target is dealt damage by a target, it deals the source of that damage 2 fire damage.

openingLines.default: Every story needs a good villain... I guess you'll do.
openingLines.OblivAeonFrontPageCharacter: Every story has an end, but this one might surprise you.

cards.title: A Little Extra
body: Play this card next to a non-target non-character card. When that card is destroyed, you may destroy up to 2 non-character non-target cards or {CarnavalCharacter} may deal each non-hero target 1 fire damage and 1 projectile damage.
[b]Power:[/b] Destroy a hero Ongoing or Equipment card.

flavorQuotes.text: If they want to make a mess,{BR}who am I to argue?

cards.title: Agent of Chaos
body: Play the top card of each other deck, in turn order, beginning with the environment deck.

flavorQuotes.text: Need a distraction.
Thought you'd never ask...

cards.title: Combat Operative
body: {CarnavalCharacter} deals up to 3 targets 1 melee and 1 psychic damage each.

flavorQuotes.text: Yeah, you got me. Let's dance.

cards.title: Convincing Double
body: Play this card in a hero play area.
When a hero in this area would be dealt damage, redirect that damage to this card.

flavorQuotes.text: How many of you{BR}are there?
How many do you need?

cards.title: Explosive Macguffin
body: When a hero card is discarded on an environment or villain turn, the target with the lowest HP from that turn's associated deck deals each other target in its play area 1 projectile damage, then deals itself 4 irreducible fire damage. Then destroy this card.

flavorQuotes.text: We recovered the package, boss.{BR}... Was it ticking before?

cards.flavorReference: [y=0.75]Goon, Through the Shadows: Day of the Dead

cards.title: Got Him!
body: When another target would be dealt damage, you may redirect that damage to {CarnavalCharacter}.
After damage is redirected by this card, destroy this card.
After this card is destroyed, you may play 1 Trap and use 1 power.

flavorQuotes.text: That joker wanted us to{BR}catch him.

cards.title: Improvisational Theatre
body: When this card is destroyed, you may draw a card, play a card, and use a power.
At the end of your turn, you may discard a card to put the top card of a deck into play.
powers: Draw a card. Destroy this card.

flavorQuotes.text: Do you actually have a{BR}plan, or are you just making it up{BR}as you go? Because those are [b]not[/b] the{BR}same and I'm not sure you get that.

cards.title: Man With a Plan
body: Reveal cards from the top of your deck until 2 Traps are revealed. Put them into your hand. Shuffle the other revealed cards into your deck.
You may play a Trap.
cards.flavorText: {BR}“I'm going now, John. Don't{BR}make business personal. We had some good{BR}times, didn't we? I hope you and your friends{BR}make it out. I really do.”{BR}- Bombshell, Division X: Old Habits #2

cards.title: Melpomene
body: When this card enters play, destroy all other Masques.
When one of your cards would enter play, {CarnavalCharacter} may deal 1 target 1 melee or 1 psychic damage.
Increase damage dealt by {CarnavalCharacter} by 1.
powers: Play a One-Shot from your trash, then put it on the bottom of your deck.

flavorQuotes.text: They're all dead. So{BR}what? Police can't touch me.
Maybe not, but I can.

cards.flavorReference: Through the Shadows: Day of the Dead

cards.title: Mocking Visage
body: When this card enters play, destroy all other Masques.
Play this card next to a target. Increase damage dealt to that target by 1.
[b]Power:[/b] Each target in this card's play area deals itself 1 psychic damage.

flavorQuotes.text: Well, now, this is just{BR}unsettling.

cards.title: Portable Snare
body: If this card is not next to a target, the first time a villain target would deal damage, move this card next to that target.
Reduce damage dealt by the target next to this card by 3.
At the start of that target's turn, if this card is next to a target, {CarnavalCharacter} deals that target 2 melee damage and destroys this card.

flavorQuotes.text: Aww, did you just get{BR}outsmarted by an idiot in a clown{BR}costume, Mr. Smart McGeniusPants?

cards.title: Prosthetic Everyman
body: When this card enters play, destroy all other Masques.
Reduce the first damage dealt to {CarnavalCharacter} each turn by 1.
powers: Reveal the top 2 cards of a non-hero deck. Put them back in any order. You may play a Trap or Masque.

flavorQuotes.text: That man is a ghost. If not{BR}for his love of theatrics, none of{BR}you would even know he exists.

cards.title: Rising Action
body: When this card is destroyed, you may draw and play a card.
powers: Reveal the top card of 2 hero decks. You may play a card revealed this way. Replace the other revealed cards.

flavorQuotes.text: What do you want, son?
Couldn't sleep, Pops.{BR}Tell me a story.
I know who you are.
Me too. Tell me about Durham.

cards.title: Supporting Cast
body: A player may draw a card.
A player may play a card.

flavorQuotes.text: I can't ever{BR}save them. I thought that{BR}made me a villain, but I just{BR}need a supporting actor.
Please. I'd get top billing. Look{BR}at this chiseled jaw!

cards.title: Suspicious Body Double
body: When this card enters play, you may destroy a target with 3 or fewer HP.{BR}If a target is destroyed this way, put this card in that card's play area. Otherwise destroy this card.
At the end of that play area's turn, the 3 targets in this play area with the highest HP each deal themselves 2 toxic damage, then destroy this card.

flavorQuotes.text: Someone broke into [b]my[/b] limo,{BR}replaced the driver with a dummy rigged{BR}with knockout gas, and disabled my overpaid{BR}security, hm? See how that sounds?

cards.title: Thalia
body: When this card enters play, destroy all other Masques.
At the start of your turn, up to 2 targets regain 1 HP each.
powers: Up to 2 players may draw 1 card each.

flavorQuotes.text: Finally. Now let us{BR}see what arcane sorcery powers{BR}his magical masks... Made in China.{BR}Silence! You think this is funny?

cards.title: What's Yours is Mine
body: Play this card in another play area.
When another card enters play in this area, destroy this card.
When this card is destroyed, {CarnavalCharacter} deals each target in this play area 2 fire and 2 projectile damage.

flavorQuotes.text: That you, Carnaval?{BR}What do you know, Christmas in July!
Don't worry, I got you something{BR}special. Heard you could use a pick-me-up!
